Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Brazil to win based on their current form.
Pep Guardiola emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession.
The Messi vs. Ronaldo clash was highlighted as the match's main attraction.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brazil has scored 23 goals in 13 matches the past two years, and Costa Rica has conceded 27 goals in 14 matches.
Costa Rica has scored 19 goals in 14 games the past two years. On the flip side, Brazil has conceded 20 goals in 13 games.
In terms of goal differential, Brazil was in positive territory at +3.
With 19 goals scored and 27 conceded, Costa Rica posted a negative goal differential.
